016
017package imagingbook.parboiled.matchers;
018
019import imagingbook.parboiled.MatcherContext;
020import imagingbook.parboiled.Rule;
021import imagingbook.parboiled.matchervisitors.MatcherVisitor;
022
023import java.util.List;
024
025import static imagingbook.parboiled.common.Preconditions.checkArgNotNull;
026
027/**
028 * A {@link Matcher} that delegates all {@link Rule} and {@link Matcher} interface methods to another {@link Matcher}.
029 * It can also hold a label and a leaf marker and lazily apply these to the underlying {@link Matcher} once it is available.
030 */
031public class ProxyMatcher implements Matcher, Cloneable {
032    private Matcher target;
033    private String label;
034    private boolean nodeSuppressed;
035    private boolean subnodesSuppressed;
036    private boolean nodeSkipped;
037    private boolean memoMismatches;
038    private boolean dirty;
039
040    public List<Matcher> getChildren() {
041        if (dirty) apply();
042        return target.getChildren();
043    }
044
045    public void setLabel(String label) {
046        this.label = label;
047        updateDirtyFlag();
048    }
049
050    private void setNodeSuppressed(boolean nodeSuppressed) {
051        this.nodeSuppressed = nodeSuppressed;
052        updateDirtyFlag();
053    }
054
055    private void setSubnodesSuppressed(boolean subnodesSuppressed) {
056        this.subnodesSuppressed = subnodesSuppressed;
057        updateDirtyFlag();
058    }
059
060    private void setNodeSkipped(boolean nodeSkipped) {
061        this.nodeSkipped = nodeSkipped;
062        updateDirtyFlag();
063    }
064
065    private void setMemoMismatches(boolean memoMismatches) {
066        this.memoMismatches = memoMismatches;
067        updateDirtyFlag();
068    }
069
070    private void updateDirtyFlag() {
071        dirty = label != null || nodeSuppressed || subnodesSuppressed || nodeSkipped || memoMismatches;
072    }
073
074    public <V> boolean match(MatcherContext<V> context) {
075        if (dirty) apply();
076        return target.match(context);
077    }
078
079    public String getLabel() {
080        if (dirty) apply();
081        return target.getLabel();
082    }
083
084    public boolean hasCustomLabel() {
085        if (dirty) apply();
086        return target.hasCustomLabel();
087    }
088
089    public boolean isNodeSuppressed() {
090        if (dirty) apply();
091        return target.isNodeSuppressed();
092    }
093
094    public boolean areSubnodesSuppressed() {
095        if (dirty) apply();
096        return target.areSubnodesSuppressed();
097    }
098
099    public boolean isNodeSkipped() {
100        if (dirty) apply();
101        return target.isNodeSkipped();
102    }
103
104    public boolean areMismatchesMemoed() {
105        if (dirty) apply();
106        return target.areMismatchesMemoed();
107    }
108
109    public void setTag(Object tagObject) {
110        if (dirty) apply();
111        target.setTag(tagObject);
112    }
113
114    public Object getTag() {
115        if (dirty) apply();
116        return target.getTag();
117    }
118
119    public <R> R accept(MatcherVisitor<R> visitor) {
120        checkArgNotNull(visitor, "visitor");
121        if (dirty) apply();
122        return target.accept(visitor);
123    }
124
125    @Override
126    public String toString() {
127        if (target == null) return super.toString();
128        if (dirty) apply();
129        return target.toString();
130    }
131
132    private void apply() {
133        if (label != null) label(label);
134        if (nodeSuppressed) suppressNode();
135        if (subnodesSuppressed) suppressSubnodes();
136        if (nodeSkipped) skipNode();
137    }
138
139    public Rule label(String label) {
140        if (target == null) {
141            // if we have no target yet we need to save the label and "apply" it later
142            if (this.label == null) {
143                setLabel(label);
144                return this;
145            }
146
147            // this proxy matcher is already waiting for its label application opportunity,
148            // so we need to create another proxy level
149            ProxyMatcher anotherProxy = createClone();
150            anotherProxy.setLabel(label);
151            anotherProxy.arm(this);
152            return anotherProxy;
153        }
154
155        // we already have a target to which we can directly apply the label
156        Rule inner = unwrap(target);
157        target = (Matcher) inner.label(label); // since relabelling might change the instance we have to update it
158        setLabel(null);
159        return target;
160    }
161
162    public Rule suppressNode() {
163        if (target == null) {
164            // if we have no target yet we need to save the marker and "apply" it later
165            setNodeSuppressed(true);
166            return this;
167        }
168
169        // we already have a target to which we can directly apply the marker
170        Rule inner = unwrap(target);
171        target = (Matcher) inner.suppressNode(); // since this might change the instance we have to update it
172        setNodeSuppressed(false);
173        return target;
174    }
175
176    public Rule suppressSubnodes() {
177        if (target == null) {
178            // if we have no target yet we need to save the marker and "apply" it later
179            setSubnodesSuppressed(true);
180            return this;
181        }
182
183        // we already have a target to which we can directly apply the marker
184        Rule inner = unwrap(target);
185        target = (Matcher) inner.suppressSubnodes(); // since this might change the instance we have to update it
186        setSubnodesSuppressed(false);
187        return target;
188    }
189
190    public Rule skipNode() {
191        if (target == null) {
192            // if we have no target yet we need to save the marker and "apply" it later
193            setNodeSkipped(true);
194            return this;
195        }
196
197        // we already have a target to which we can directly apply the marker
198        Rule inner = unwrap(target);
199        target = (Matcher) inner.skipNode(); // since this might change the instance we have to update it
200        setNodeSkipped(false);
201        return target;
202    }
203
204    public Rule memoMismatches() {
205        if (target == null) {
206            // if we have no target yet we need to save the marker and "apply" it later
207            setMemoMismatches(true);
208            return this;
209        }
210
211        // we already have a target to which we can directly apply the marker
212        Rule inner = unwrap(target);
213        target = (Matcher) inner.memoMismatches(); // since this might change the instance we have to update it
214        setMemoMismatches(false);
215        return target;
216    }
217
218    /**
219     * Supplies this ProxyMatcher with its underlying delegate.
220     *
221     * @param target the Matcher to delegate to
222     */
223    public void arm(Matcher target) {
224        this.target = checkArgNotNull(target, "target");
225    }
226
227    /**
228     * Retrieves the innermost Matcher that is not a ProxyMatcher.
229     *
230     * @param matcher the matcher to unwrap
231     * @return the given instance if it is not a ProxyMatcher, otherwise the innermost non-proxy Matcher
232     */
233    public static Matcher unwrap(Matcher matcher) {
234        if (matcher instanceof ProxyMatcher) {
235            ProxyMatcher proxyMatcher = (ProxyMatcher) matcher;
236            if (proxyMatcher.dirty) proxyMatcher.apply();
237            return proxyMatcher.target;
238        }
239        return matcher;
240    }
241
242    public MatcherContext getSubContext(MatcherContext context) {
243        if (dirty) apply();
244        return target.getSubContext(context);
245    }
246
247    // creates a shallow copy
248    private ProxyMatcher createClone() {
249        try {
250            return (ProxyMatcher) clone();
251        } catch (CloneNotSupportedException e) {
252            throw new IllegalStateException();
253        }
254    }
255
256}
